answerText: Philip Arthur Larkin[10] This Larkin poem opens by claiming "they fuck you up, your mum and dad" and goes on to advise "get out as early as you can, and don't have any kids yourself."
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | South Carolina and Carlton | 18 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One novel by this man sees John Kemp invent a sister to confound his roommate with false stories, but eventually meets a real girl with her name. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author of Jill, perhaps better known for poetry collections like High Windows and The Whitsun Weddings.
